meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a heath
meanings.sent1: The heathlike flowers added a touch of wild beauty to the garden.
meanings.sent2: The landscape had a heathlike appearance with its sparse vegetation.
meanings.sent3: The heathlike shrubs seemed to be whispering secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, tangled and heathlike, framed her face in a natural halo.
meanings.sent5: The heathlike scent of the moor lingered in the cool evening air.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of a heath
meanings.sent1: The heathlike terrain was dotted with colorful wildflowers.
meanings.sent2: The air carried a heathlike fragrance of pine and earth.
meanings.sent3: The heathlike atmosphere of the forest made it feel enchanted.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a heathlike quality, soft and soothing.
meanings.sent5: The heathlike colors of the sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and purple.
